ComicInfo.Summary: Member of the Wedding: Rick arrives for the pending nuptials of Bruce and Betty. The Hulkbusters and Samson battle the Hulk. During the wedding ceremony of Bruce and Betty, Thunderbolt Ross shows up to stop the proceedings. Even though he shoots Rick in the gut, the show goes on and Bruce and Betty are married at last.
ComicInfo.Tags: Rom,Gamma Base,Rock,Hulkbusters,Hulk,Rick Jones,Doc Samson,Redeemer,Thunderbolt Ross,Betty Ross
ComicInfo.Title: Member of the Wedding
